doc:
Leslie Phillips https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leslie_Phillips 0 Leslie Samuel Phillips (born 20 April 1924) is an English actor who came to prominence in films in the 1950s, acting as a suave charmer with an exaggerated upper class accent, in the style of Terry Thomas. After a notable success in the Carry On films and the Doctor series, he moved away from comedy into character roles in the Harry Potter series and many TV sitcoms, as well as stage work. Leslie_Samuel_Phillips ( born 20_April_1924 ) is an_English_actor who came to prominence in films in the_1950s , acting as a_suave_charmer with an_exaggerated_upper_class_accent , in the_style of Terry_Thomas . After a_notable_success in the_Carry On films and the_Doctor_series , he moved away from comedy into character_roles in the_Harry_Potter_series and many_TV_sitcoms , as_well_as stage_work .
